Contact Details: Author: Community and Mental Health, NHS Digital WWW.digital.nhs.uk Responsible Statistician: Dan Collinson enquiries@nhsdigital.nhs.uk
Description: This report presents findings from the Out of Area Placements in Mental Health Services July 2019 collection. The collection is expected to capture the details of all out of area placements in acute adult mental health inpatient services in England from both NHS and independent providers. NHS Digital is running this interim data collection in the Clinical Audit Platform (CAP) until the data becomes aligned and available from the Mental Health Services Dataset (MHSDS). The MHSDS is the chosen mechanism for the long term collection of this data.
Name: Out of Area Placements in Mental Health Services
Route from landing page to data: Data can be located by by clicking on the link under latest version a CSV and XLS spreadsheet is located under resources
Sizing Notes: Although the majoirty of tables are in the same format, there is alot  of data, with the use of footnotes.  Some time may be required to determine dimensions, some messiness with the use of numbers and % and the inconsistency of use of time.  Maybe better suited to the mental health family.
